text: Cloning of murine <extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , a T cell - specific transcription factor interacting with functional motifs in the CD3-epsilon and T cell receptor alpha enhancers .
<extra_id_0> CD3-epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene expression is confined to the T cell lineage .

We have recently identified and cloned a human transcription factor , <extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , that binds to a functional element in the T lymphocyte - specific enhancer of <extra_id_0> CD3-epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
In a panel of human cell lines , <extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression was restricted to T lineage cells .
<extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> belonged to a novel family of genes that contain the so-called high mobility group 1 ( HMG ) box .
Here we report the cloning of murine <extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
Two splice alternatives were identified that were not previously observed in human <extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
Murine and human <extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> displayed a 95.5 % overall amino acid homology .

Recombinant murine and human <extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> recognized the same sequence motif in the CD3-epsilon enhancer as judged by gel retardation and methylation interference assays .
With the murine cDNA clones several aspects of <extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> were analyzed .
First , deletion analysis revealed that a region of <extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> containing the HMG box was sufficient for sequence - specific binding .

Second , by high stringency Northern blotting and in situ hybridization , <extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression was shown to be confined to the thymus and to the T cell areas of the spleen .

Third , <extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> bound specifically to a functional T cell - specific element in the <extra_id_0> T cell receptor alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> TCR-alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) enhancer .

The T lineage - specific expression and the affinity for functional motifs in the <extra_id_0> TCR-alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> CD3-epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> enhancers imply an important role for <extra_id_0> TCF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in the establishment of the mature T cell phenotype .
